channel.title: projects on technologiad
channel.description: Recent content in projects on technologiad

item.title: Projects
item.description: handyman [Repo] A collection of personal Python Data Science scripts. sansor [Repo] A collection of personal R Data Science scripts. audiobook maker [Repo] A pipeline to convert pdfs (via OCR), plain text, or web articles to mp3s using Google’s Text to Speech API. db ru [Repo] A prototype of a database frontend to allow non-technical users to Read and Update a database. It also included a log of the change to each cell to faciltate consistent reversion.
